name: Get Lost in Your Own Madness
name_original: Get Lost in Your Own Madness
description:
For Extra Credits Game Jam 2019.

A simple game where all actions are connected; each movement or action cuts off some options while opening others. 

Controls:

  • Arrow keys: Move
  • Space bar: Torch
  • "B" key: Interact
  • Enter key: Hide key overlay

I have had the most success running this on FireFox, but it should theoretically run on any browser. If there is not "Key" or "Door" visible in the level, reload the web-page; this is a bug that I didn't have time to work out of the level generation before submitting.

Game design engine used: Godot
Visual assets designed by: Millium8
Coding designed by: Millium8
Sound designed by: N/A (No, there is no sound in the game yet)
